= Wiki editor quick keys =

== Contents ==

* __ALT+L__ - create new list.
* __ALT+I__ - create new list item.
* __ALT+C__ - create level 1 heading (caption).
* __ALT+S__ - create level 2 heading (section).
* __ALT+P__ - create level 3 heading (paragraph).

== Control ==

* __ALT+SHIFT+S__ - save current page.
* __ALT+SHIFT+C__ - compile current page into html.
